about_the_game:
Dark Life: Excalibur is a fantasy action adventure that tells the story of Aron, a human linked to the most famous and legendary sword of all time: Excalibur. Aron must find peace through his family's vengeance and to do so he must discover why York, the lord of the giants, destroyed everything he fought for. To confront the beings that pursue him, he must forge a sword capable of killing gods, without knowing that it would become the most legendary sword of all time, but also the one that has shed the most blood.



Forge the darkest and most violent legend of Excalibur with this title, a tribute made by and for Souls saga lovers.



In the world of Dark Life: Excalibur, bestiality is a power that accumulates in the hearts of the beings that inhabit it. By killing enemies, you can accumulate bestiality in the form of fragments, which can be used to buy upgrades, level up and improve parts of your Excalibur sword to build its own structure.



The game is divided into zones that you must overcome by exploring to improve Aron and Excalibur's stats.

Each zone will have a final boss and mini bosses that are part of the story. Finishing them is a necessary challenge to accomplish your goal. You will encounter puzzles as well as frantic combat and sometimes you will be overwhelmed by the difficulty of certain enemies.

content_descriptors.notes:
This product may include content not suitable for all ages or
for all ages or for viewing at work: Violent

About the Game


Dark Life: Excalibur is a fantasy action adventure that tells the story of Aron, a human linked to the most famous and legendary sword of all time: Excalibur. Aron must find peace through his family's vengeance and to do so he must discover why York, the lord of the giants, destroyed everything he fought for. To confront the beings that pursue him, he must forge a sword capable of killing gods, without knowing that it would become the most legendary sword of all time, but also the one that has shed the most blood.



Forge the darkest and most violent legend of Excalibur with this title, a tribute made by and for Souls saga lovers.



In the world of Dark Life: Excalibur, bestiality is a power that accumulates in the hearts of the beings that inhabit it. By killing enemies, you can accumulate bestiality in the form of fragments, which can be used to buy upgrades, level up and improve parts of your Excalibur sword to build its own structure.



The game is divided into zones that you must overcome by exploring to improve Aron and Excalibur's stats.

Each zone will have a final boss and mini bosses that are part of the story. Finishing them is a necessary challenge to accomplish your goal. You will encounter puzzles as well as frantic combat and sometimes you will be overwhelmed by the difficulty of certain enemies.

name: Dark Life Excalibur

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 or AMD RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: Microsoft Xbox ® Controller for Windows®
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

reviews:
“Dark Life: Excalibur wins game of the year at the eighth edition of the PS Talents Awards”
Hobby Consolas

“Dark Life Excalibur is the big winner at the eighth edition of the PlayStation Talents Awards”
Vida Extra
short_description: Dark Life: Excalibur is a fantasy action adventure that tells the story of Aron, a human who is linked to the most famous and legendary sword of all time: Excalibur.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
